info.title: Blue Ant© API Documentation
info.description: Documentation for all Blue Ant© rest apis. An api-key must be generated in Blue Ant© and used as header field `Authorization: Bearer <token>` or as header field `BA-Authorization: <token>`

Find all persons for given filter.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Filter persons by given user name.

parameters.name: externalSystemId
parameters.description: Filter persons by given external system id.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: Filter persons by given external id.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Filter persons by the given types. This can be one or multiple values. If no person type is provided than only internal persons will be returned.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filter persons by the given statuses. This can be one or multiple values. If no person state is provided than only active persons will be returned.

200.description: In case of success this endpoint returns one person.
In case of success this endpoint returns one person.
In case of success this endpoint returns one person.

200.description: A successful query returns the ordered planning entries for a project according to the filter values. A planning entry can be a milestone, task or collective task. Fields can be included or excluded depending on the occurrence in the respective planning type.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: The Id of a template where the data should be used from to create a new project. The data from the template will be used as default if no data was provided for a field in the request.

parameters.name: applyProjectSettings
parameters.description: Boolean flag indicating if the template's project settings should also be applied to the new project. By default if flag is not specified, these settings will not be applied.

requestBody.description: Project values for creating a new project.

200.description: A successful query returns the resource entries for a project.

provides basic service provider metadata for SAML v2.0
Find all work-times for authenticated user.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Begin of the filter time range for work-times. End date must be provided too if start date is set.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End of the filter time range for work-times. Start date must be provided too if end date is set.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given project id.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given task id.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given ticket id.

parameters.name: workTimeState
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given status. Valid statuses are 0 (open), 1 (released) or 2 (xxported).

parameters.name: externalSystemId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by given external system id.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Filter work-times by given text-snippet from comment

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Begin of the filter time range for work-times. End date must be provided too if start date is set.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End of the filter time range for work-times. Start date must be provided too if end date is set.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given project id.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given task id.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given ticket id.

parameters.name: workTimeState
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given status. Valid statuses are 0 (open), 1 (released) or 2 (xxported).

parameters.name: externalSystemId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by given external system id.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Filter work-times by given text-snippet from comment

put.description: Update an existing work-time for an authenticated user. This endpoint can be used to completely replace a work-time.

delete.description: Delete a work-time for authenticated user.

patch.description: Update an existing work-time for an authenticated user. This endpoint can be used for a partial update of a work-time. It is not possible to reset values to null. In this case use the PUT endpoint instead to update a work-time.

put.description: Update an existing work-time for a given user. This endpoint can be used to completely replace a work-time.

delete.description: Delete a work-time for given user.

patch.description: Update an existing work-time for a given user. This endpoint can be used for a partial update of a work-time. It is not possible to reset values to null. In this case use the PUT endpoint instead to update a work-time.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Begin of the filter time range for work-times. End date must be provided too if start date is set.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End of the filter time range for work-times. Start date must be provided too if end date is set.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given project id.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given task id.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given ticket id.

parameters.name: workTimeState
parameters.description: Filter work-times by the given status. Valid statuses are 0 (open), 1 (released) or 2 (xxported).

parameters.name: externalSystemId
parameters.description: Filter work-times by given external system id.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Filter work-times by given text-snippet from comment

vatIdentifier.description: VAT identifier - The VAT-identifier must begin with a valid country code in alpha-2 representation according to ISO-3166-1.

invoiceLayout.description: Invoice layout name of the report. For modification, this must be a unique report name and the report process type must be 'billing'.

active.description: If this entity is active. Only active entities can be assigned/used. Defaults to true.

active.description: If this entity is active. Only active entities can be assigned/used. Defaults to true.

name.description: An unique name for this entity.

publicVisible.description: Can the absence be recorded by all users or only by specific users. True: Every user can record the absence type in their calendar.

hintPermitted.description: Restricts the visibility of absences as a tooltip in the frontend. True: The tooltip can be viewed by all resources.

wtPermitted.description: Can work-times be recorded during the absence. True: Work-times can be recorded during the absence.

planRelevant.description: Is the absence taken into account when calculating the availability of resources. True: The absence is taken into account when calculating the availability of resources.

plannable.description: Can the absence be planned by resources. True: The absence can be planned by resources.

resourcesCanDeleteAndChange.description: Are resources allowed to edit and change their absences after they have been approved. True: Resources are allowed to edit and change their absences after they have been approved.

daySegments.description: Day segments in which the absence can be recorded.

items.description: Day segments in which the absence can be recorded.

approval.description: The approval process for the absence type.

requestEmail.description: The recipient for emails for information about an absence request.

infoMailTo.description: The recipient for emails for information about an approved absence.

worktimeDeduction.description: Reduces the absence type the target work-time. True: The absence type reduces the target work-time.

type.description: The type of the absence is used for calculating the leave account.

active.description: Absences with deactivated settings can no longer be requested or planned.

name.description: An unique name for this entity.

visibleTravelExpenses.description: True if this activity is visible on travel expenses.

extended.description: True if this activity is extended.

active.description: If this entity is active. Only active entities can be assigned/used. Defaults to true.

default.description: When set to true set this entry as the default entry. Only one active entry can be set as default. Defaults to false.

entryType.description: The type of the planning entry. Default type is 'task'.

number.description: The work breakdown structure number (Sequential no. or WBS-code).

name.description: Deprecated: Description of the task.

startWished.description: Start date of the task depending on the 'limitation'.

endWished.description: End date of the task depending on the 'limitation'

limitation.description: The time restrictions of the task depending on the 'startWished' and 'endWished'. (For classic planned projects only)

priority.description: The priority of the task. (For classic planned projects only)

sortId.description: Order within project plan depending on the 'parentId'.

parentId.description: The parent task id of this task.

progressActual.description: Actual percent complete for the task depending on the project settings.

note.description: Note for this task, HTML usage possible.

additionalProperties.description: Custom fields with context type 'Task' only.

customFields.description: Custom fields with context type 'Task' only.

reportingDate.description: The Date when the progress was reported.

type.description: Determines the type of the task. 'WORK' or 'DURATION' are possible. In agile planned projects only 'WORK' is valid. In classic planned projects the default type depends on the project settings.

billableStatus.description: The billable status of this task. The default billable status depends on the project type. If 'parentId' is given the billable status is taken from the parent task.

reasonNotBillableId.description: The reason not billable Id for the task. Only available if 'Use reasons not billable' is activated in customizing.

isCollectiveTask.description: Is true if task is a collective task.

workActualMinutes.description: The actual work in minutes recorded by the resources for the task.

workActualDays.description: The actual work in MD recorded by the resources for the task.

workPlannedMinutes.description: The work in minutes planned for the task. If 'workPlannedMinutes' and 'workPlannedDays' are specified, the 'workPlannedDays' is used. Only available if the 'type' of the task is 'WORK'.

workPlannedDays.description: The work in MD planned for the task. If 'workPlannedMinutes' and 'workPlannedDays' are specified, the 'workPlannedDays' is used. Only available if the 'type' of the task is 'WORK'.

workEstimatedMinutes.description: The work in minutes estimated by the resources for the task.

workEstimatedDays.description: The work in MD estimated by the resources for the task.

durationMinutes.description: The anticipated duration in minutes for the task. Only available in classic planning and if the 'type' of the task is 'DURATION'.

durationDays.description: The anticipated duration in MD for the task. Only available in classic planning and if the 'type' of the task is 'DURATION'.

subjectMemo.description: Memo field subject. The content can be plain text or html. Html can only be stored if wysywyg is enabled for memo fields. If wysywyg is not enabled then html tags will be removed. The setting can be found under Administration > Customizing > Projects > Default settings

problemMemo.description: Memo field problem. The content can be plain text or html. Html can only be stored if wysywyg is enabled for memo fields. If wysywyg is not enabled then html tags will be removed. The setting can be found under Administration > Customizing > Projects > Default settings

name.description: Name of customer

active.description: If this entity is active. Only active entities can be assigned/used. Defaults to true.

name.description: An unique name for this entity.

roleId.description: The identification number of the project role.

timeGuessed.description: The time estimated of the resource.

progress.description: The subjective progress of the resource's share in percent.

workInMinutes.description: The resource's reported working time in minutes.

completed.description: True if the share of the resource is completed.

capInPercent.description: The percentage of the resource's work time capacity to be used for the activity.
